data.title: Truly have it YOUR way!
data.text: Home cooking, with nothing frozen and everything can be customized!  Friendly staff, make you feel like you're at home in your kitchen visiting with your family.  Everything is good and if it's not on the menu, ask anyway!  They'll make it for you!  Good place, good people!

data.title: Lunch destination
data.text: I eat here 2-4 times a week for lunch and sometimes for breakfast as well...for the last 6 months. The variety, speed, service, quality, price, location...are all perfect for me.  I haven't had a bad meal yet. Only one meal (1) was not really good (the chicken was a little dry and tough). I do have my regulars that I love: chicken/pork quesadilla with grilled onions and chiles, cheeseburgers that are as good as I have ever eaten, and the daily specials that are as tasty as they are varied.  The 3 ladies that run it are wonderful, fun, creative, and personable.  I can walk in and tell them how I'm feeling and they can whip up something to match my mood...really.  I'm selfish, I guess, because I'm glad it's a little out of the way. This is my kitchen away from my kitchen.  Great food. Cindy, Brittany, Sam - live long and make lots of money.

data.title: Good place for lunch/breakfast.
data.text:
The Downtown Rendezvous is my favorite kind of place. Local place with good food, local owners who are a little crazy. Family owned and operated! Mother, daughter and family friend. 
 My wife is working for the city of Mesa so we have become regulars on Thursday for lunch. 
 The burgers are excellent with some original offerings (Jalapeno popper burger!), good sandwiches and excellent breakfast. 
 Only downside is no fryer but I eat too much fried stuff anyway. Go in and say hi to Sam from me. ;-)

owner_response.author: Cindy F, Owner at Down Town Rendezvous, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dann, thanks for the review, ever little bet helps grow our business.  My dad use to say hack you've been here for an hour now "Your Family". See you and your wife next Thursday, by the way what is your wife's name?  Shes family too you know. lol
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Office Building Restaurant
data.text: Happened on to this little gem while attending an event in downtown Mesa. It's in the lobby of a large office building. In our experience this setting doesn't lend itself to terrific food. Boy were we surprised. Excellent Bacon Cheese Burger. Patties are made in house and aggressively seasoned. Terrific Chicken Cordon Bleu Sandwich. Expecting chicken roll the sandwich features a nicely grilled thinly sliced chicken breast and quality ham. Order at the counter, which is terribly cluttered for impulse buying with morning coffee. The server was very knowledgeable and friendly. Checked on us several times and refilled beverages. The place even has a small patio. The next time we're in the area we're sure to stop in.

owner_response.author: Cindy F, Owner at Down Town Rendezvous, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the kind review.  My girls remember you two coming into Downtown Rendezvous.  I told them about your review and they were so excited about it.  Hope to see you soon. Thanks again
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Neighborhood Gathering Place
data.text: This is all about good food, warm atmosphere, friendly and very social with many local patrons.  I have never had a bad meal here and everything is cooked to order.

owner_response.author: Cindy F, Owner at Down Town Rendezvous, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I finally figured out how to respond to our guess here at Downtown Rendezvous with Trip Advisor. I'm so glad you enjoy our food.  We have so much fun making good food with lots of love.  We want to be "your mothers kitchen" and serve you and your friends. We have added new great things to the menu so if your in the neighborhood stop on by again for "lunch and a laugh"
Thank you again
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: They do everything well!
data.text: Not the cheapest place in downtown, but some of the best food anywhere! Prices are within reason. Everything is cooked to order, and they'll make anything they have the ingredients for, even if it's not on the menu. Cindy and her daughters are friendly and also excellent cooks! IMHO, the breakfasts are especially good, and also the best value for the money. Nobody makes better pancakes than Chanel! You can call ahead to place your order if you're in a hurry or want it to go. They offer charge accounts to regular customers if desired! This is a comfy, pleasant place to hang out if you've got some time to kill, with good coffee (indoors in the summer or on the patio the rest of the year).

owner_response.author: Cindy F, Owner at Down Town Rendezvous, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Sorry this has taken so long, I really have a hard time with social media, trying very hard to understand how it all works.  Anyway thank you for your review, I sometimes wonder if we're doing things right or not.  I love our pancakes too, you must try the french toast, we even stuff the french toast with cream cheese and jelly, just something different to break up the day.  Next time your in try the pancakes with peanut butter-you will never go back to syrup lol
Thanks again
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Big A.. Burger
data.text: Wondered in to this hidden gem while in downtown (the original version) Mesa. This is truly a BIG A.. burger. Tasty ! They do breakfast too. Definitely worth a trip.

owner_response.author: Cindy F, Owner at Down Town Rendezvous, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I'm just learning how to respond to my guest at the restaurant on social media, I'm a slow learner so I'm sorry this took such a long time, do hope you have stopped in since you wrote this review. Glad you enjoyed the big "Are's"  that is one of our most popular burgers.  Hope you were full, I don't want anyone leaving without being full, its a mother thing.  You must stop by next time your in the area and try our new "Extreme Burger" or hay we could make it a "Big Are's Extreme Burger" ya that sounds good.  Anyway thank you again and hope to see you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
